mapper.select: SELECT spec_kind, box_count, recept, collect_case, collation_on_shelf, off_shelf, unpack FROM partial_bussiness_standard
mapper.update: REPLACE INTO partial_bussiness_standard ( spec_kind, box_count, recept, collect_case, collation_on_shelf, off_shelf, unpack ) VALUES ( #{spec_kind}, #{box_count}, #{recept}, #{collect_case}, #{collation_on_shelf}, #{off_shelf}, #{unpack} )
